name: Kitchen Warfare
description:
"Best game I've ever played"

- Alina Herrmann, 2020

How to play:

- Select lane for spawning unit by typing 1 or 2 .. or 5

- Type the name of one of the three units shown at the bottom of the screen

- Pay attention to the top of the screen. 3 Spheres with letter will appear from time to time. Type the 3 letters in a row to boost all your units!

Used topics:

Heist & Connection
